snippet: The NATO confirmation comes after days of reports from Ukrainian and European officials of tanks crossing into eastern Ukraine in scenes reminiscent of Russia’s invasion of Crimea.
abstract: Senior NATO official confirms that Russian troops and military equipment are crossing border into Ukraine, confirming claims of Ukrainian military officials; Russian troops appear to be preparing for renewed military action, though exact intentions remain unclear; Russia denies accusations.

byline.contributor: Andrew E. Kramer contributed reporting from Moscow, and James Kanter from Brussels.

lead_paragraph: The NATO confirmation comes after days of reports from Ukrainian and European officials of tanks crossing into eastern Ukraine in scenes reminiscent of Russia’s invasion of Crimea.

headline.main: Fears Rise as Russian Military Units Pour Into Ukraine
headline.print_headline: Fears Rise as Russian Military Units Pour Into Ukraine
